problem.p:
Given that a mouse listener is registered to a source object, which of the following method(s) of the registered mouse listener is(are) invoked after a mouse button is clicked on the source object?
1. public void mousePressed(MouseEvent e)
2. public void mouseReleased(MouseEvent e)
3. public void mouseEntered(MouseEvent e)
4. public void mouseExited(MouseEvent e)
5. public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent e)

div.p: A mouse click event involves two actions, pressing the mouse button and releasing it. Therefore, when we click on the source object, the mousePressed() method is invoked first, followed by the mouseReleased() method. Finally, the mouseClicked() method is invoked.
